definition: sound of sighing/(interjection expressing surprise, sorrow, regret, disappointment etc) oh/damn/wow

sentences.english: FDA looks to curb abuse of cough medicine.
sentences.chinese: 美國FDA計劃出臺措施，遏止濫用止咳藥。

sentences.english: Conclusion Qingjinzhike - soup has better therapeutic efficacy on coughing due to wind - heat in children.
sentences.chinese: 結論清金止咳湯治療小兒外感風熱咳嗽具有良好效果。

sentences.english: Elderberry is usually taken as a liquid (like cough syrup) or a lozenge.
sentences.chinese: 接骨木提取物一般做成液體，如止咳糖漿，或是錠劑。

sentences.english: Where can I buy some cough medicine?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏可以買到止咳藥？

sentences.english: I'll prescribe you some medicine and a cough syrup.
sentences.chinese: 我給您開點藥和止咳糖漿。

sentences.english: Objective Research dry cough expectorant cough syrup- Pharmacodynamic.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究乾咳清糖漿的止咳祛痰的藥效學。

sentences.english: The other medicine is for his cough. Gie him one teaspoonful three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 另一種是止咳藥水，每次一茶匙，一天三次。

sentences.english: Those tiny leaves are packed with cough-relieving compounds.
sentences.chinese: 這些小小的葉子裏滿是止咳的化合物。

sentences.english: ResultsThin film coating can promote the storage stability of Mango Anticough Tablet.
sentences.chinese: 結果薄膜包衣可提高芒果止咳片的儲存期穩定性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of Qingjinzhike - soup on coughing due to wind - heat in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察清金止咳湯治療小兒外感風熱咳嗽的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anti-cough effect of Zihu Zhike oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價紫胡止咳液的止咳作用。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the anti-cough effect of Zihu Zhike oral liquid.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價紫胡止咳液的止咳作用。

sentences.english: Lungs and they cough, Porridge Riga lily.
sentences.chinese: 潤肺又止咳，粥里加百合。

sentences.english: Conclusion "Shegan Mixture" is effective in treating childhood cough.
sentences.chinese: 結論射干合劑治療小兒咳嗽優於小兒止咳化痰糖漿。

sentences.english: A All the traffic pollution makes me cough.
sentences.chinese: 我在哪裏可以買到止咳藥？

sentences.english: Drink warm water, warm water will be also included in the mouth has very good effect of cough.
sentences.chinese: 多喝溫開水，將溫開水含在口中也有很好的止咳效果。

definition: to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
Sichuan fritillary bulb (Bulbus fritillariae cirrhosae, used in TCM)
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
